message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to start with a price of $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I think we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $90.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I do need to make a profit on this sale. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering your offer, I believe $100 would be a fair price for both of us. Let me know if this works for you.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower. I'm confident that this product is worth more than that, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
